goal: Launch Spons Easy MVP enabling automated sponsorship proposal generation

tasks.title: Define user personas
tasks.description: Document the 3 primary personas (creators, organizers, associations) with their pain points and motivations

tasks.title: Create MVP PRD
tasks.description: Product Requirements Document detailing MVP features with priorities and acceptance criteria

tasks.title: Design landing page
tasks.description: Wireframes and copy for high-converting landing page with clear value proposition

tasks.title: Technical setup AdonisJS
tasks.description: Initialize AdonisJS 6 project with auth, database, and base structure

tasks.title: Design data model
tasks.description: Database schema for users, profiles, proposals, sponsors

tasks.title: Implement authentication
tasks.description: Register, login, password reset with AdonisJS Auth

tasks.title: User profile builder
tasks.description: Profile creation form (creator type, audience, niche, etc.)

tasks.title: Proposal builder
tasks.description: Wizard interface to create a sponsorship proposal step by step

tasks.title: Content generation engine
tasks.description: Automatic proposal text generation based on profile and inputs

tasks.title: User dashboard
tasks.description: Overview of created proposals with statuses

tasks.title: Implement landing page
tasks.description: Frontend development of landing page with waitlist form

tasks.title: Setup analytics & tracking
tasks.description: PostHog or Plausible integration for conversion tracking

tasks.title: Tests & QA
tasks.description: End-to-end tests of complete user journey

tasks.title: Production deployment
tasks.description: Deploy to production on Railway with CI/CD

tasks.title: Beta launch
tasks.description: Beta launch with first users and feedback collection

milestones.name: Week 1: Foundation
milestones.description: Technical setup, personas, and product specs validated

milestones.name: Week 2: Core Features
milestones.description: User profile and proposal builder functional

milestones.name: Week 3: Polish & Export
milestones.description: PDF export, dashboard, and landing page ready
